Text:
a 'high quality' Pioneer TT with OM20 is really low-fi. 
This is not what I call a recommendation for vinyl.
for some reason tpb won't allow links, but anyone concerned in the least bit should google OM20 stylus review. and ]eep you have a nice life now.
Thanks for posting Do you have a flac version of Woo-Hoo by the 5.6.7.8's? TIA.
Cheers press, I only have it on Bomb the Rocks 2LP, which side a is basically Bomb the Twist. If I ever get a full day off I may rip that 2LP. But to be honest don't count the days, we'll see.

you can post all the links you want to audiokarma, but that doesn't make it anything more than a budget cart. Just because ppl post on audiokarma doesn't mean they are right or wellinformed. I know because I'm posting there too. 

If you try a cart (and TT) somewhere over the $100 range you can have a nice life too. And better sound.
]eep, this is an anonymous, internet, www, quarrel. Nobody wins. I love my PL-115D and OM20, you don't, c'est la vie.
